text: Abu Taher Mohammad Shamsuzzaman (known as ATM Shamsuzzaman; 10 September 1941 â€“ 20 February 2021) was a Bangladeshi actor, director, screenwriter and playwright. He was known for his roles in Madam Fuli (1999), Churiwala (2001), Mon Bosena Porar Table E (2009) and Chorabali (2012). Shamsuzzaman was born in Noakhali District, Bengal Presidency. Shamsuzzaman died at his home in Dhaka on 20 February 2021 at the age of 79. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Bangladeshi movie actors Category:Bangladeshi writers Category:Screenwriters Category:Bangladeshi playwrights Category:Stage actors Category:Theatre directors Category:People from Chittagong Division
title: ATM Shamsuzzaman
